thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Victor Khong
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Victor Khong

author: Victor Khong
title: Victor Khong
text:
I was approached by a door knocker selling me solar and out of curiosity I took the appointment. After spending an hour with the sales consultant in my home and receiving a Quote: for $14k (super price) I declined the "you must sign now or lose this fantastic offer" and suggested he call me back in a week which he never did.
So I went to the web and just googled other solar providers and filled in online requests for Quote: s. Out of sheer coincindence I stumbled across Solar Quote: s and immediately requested 3 Quote: s from local providers servicing my area. Immediately I was contacted by one of the providers, followed by a second provider the next day, while the third provider simply gave me a Quote: via email a few days later.
After spending time with the first two providers who came and visited me and wrote up a formal Quote: for me, I decided to go with one of these providers for my solar unit. I would have been quite comfortable to go with any of the three providers recommended by Solar Quote: s.
Finn is really great and even answered a question for me regarding one of the systems that was presented to me. All in all this is a great web site and thanks so much to Finn for setting it up to guide us through this maze of Solar for the home.
